password.title: Password
password.description: OS-level password for logging into the jump server host

stream_name.title: Stream name
stream_name.description: The name of the stream or table you want to create

file_type.title: File type
file_type.description: The file type you want to sync. Currently only 'csv' and 'json' files are supported.

separator.title: CSV Separator (Optional)
separator.description: The separator used in the CSV files. Define None if you want to use the Sniffer functionality

folder_path.title: Folder Path (Optional)
folder_path.description: The directory to search files for sync

max_depth.title: Recursion depth (Optional)
max_depth.description: Number of levels to search for files in the folder path. Warning: this can be a very expensive operation when `max_depth>=2`

column_names.title: Column names (Optional)
column_names.description: A separable string of column names. If null is passed, the first row will be used as column names

column_names_separator.title: Separator used to separate the header (Optional)
column_names_separator.description: A character used to split the column names listed at column_names

autogenerate_column_names.title: Autogenerate column names (Optional)
autogenerate_column_names.description: If true and no column names and separator are provided, the column names will be autogenerated using a prefix and a counter

autogenerated_column_names_prefix.title: Autogenerated column names prefix (Optional)
autogenerated_column_names_prefix.description: Prefix used when autogenerating column names

file_pattern.title: File Pattern (Optional)
file_pattern.description: The regular expression to specify files for sync in a chosen Folder Path
examples: log-([0-9]{4})([0-9]{2})([0-9]{2}) - This will filter files which  `log-yearmmdd`

file_most_recent.title: Most recent file (Optional)
file_most_recent.description: Sync only the most recent file for the configured folder path and file pattern

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: The date from which you'd like to replicate data for all incremental streams, in the format YYYY-MM-DDT00:00:00Z. All data generated after this date will be replicated.
